scripts.build:prod:event: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 NODE_ENV=production NODE_TYPE=event webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod:exam: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 NODE_ENV=production NODE_TYPE=exam webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.deploy:event: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 NODE_TYPE=event pm2 start build/event/app.js
scripts.deploy:exam: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=2048 NODE_TYPE=exam pm2 start build/exam/app.js
scripts.start:event: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TYPE=event nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files ./src/app.ts
scripts.start:exam: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_TYPE=exam nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files ./src/app.ts
